    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behaviors (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_history TEXT,
    last_activity TIMESTAMP,
    subscription_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_interests (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    interests TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
